unnormalised: **Environmental News Snippet: Renewable Energy Surge in Rajasthan**
normalised: **Environmental News Snippet: Renewable Energy Surge in Rajasthan**

unnormalised: Namaste friends! Rajasthan, our land of sunshine and forts, is seriously upping its renewable energy game! We're not just talking a few solar panels on rooftops anymore.
normalised: Namaste friends! Rajasthan, our land of sunshine and forts, is seriously upping its renewable energy game! We are not just talking a few solar panels on rooftops anymore.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma at MNRE recently announced that Rajasthan commissioned a massive 500 MW solar park near Jodhpur, covering thousands of sq ft. That's enough power to light up several cities!
normalised: Doctor Sharma at M N R E recently announced that Rajasthan commissioned a massive five hundred megawatt solar park near Jodhpur, covering thousands of square feet. That is enough power to light up several cities!

unnormalised: But that's not all! The state government is also investing heavily in wind energy projects along the coast. Apparently, they're aiming to generate an additional 2 GW through wind by next year.
normalised: But that is not all! The state government is also investing heavily in wind energy projects along the coast. Apparently, they are aiming to generate an additional two gigawatts through wind by next year.

unnormalised: Local villagers are also getting involved, with many setting up small-scale biogas plants using agricultural waste. Talk about turning waste into wealth!
normalised: Local villagers are also getting involved, with many setting up small scale biogas plants using agricultural waste. Talk about turning waste into wealth!

unnormalised: The initiative is expected to reduce carbon emissions by millions of tonnes and save the state Rs. 1000 crores annually in energy costs. Plus, imagine the jalebis we can make with all that clean energy!
normalised: The initiative is expected to reduce carbon emissions by millions of tonnes and save the state rupee one thousand crore annually in energy costs. Plus, imagine the jalebis we can make with all that clean energy!

unnormalised: These projects are a big win for the environment and for our economy. Itâ€™s a testament to how 'Atmanirbhar Bharat' can shine brightly. Jai Hind! The future is green, folks!
normalised: These projects are a big win for the environment and for our economy. It is a testament to how 'Atmanirbhar Bharat' can shine brightly. Jai Hind! The future is green, folks!
